results.content:
It was easy to follow steps and now I have working web app.
Some of explanations were very helpful.
It would be good to see "talking head" from time to time, but it's ok.
Thank you for the course!

I'm waiting for extension course about how to work with databases in kotlin and how to use kotlin for multiplatform development.
